name: Bike Rider (catdribble)
description:
Only Works on Desktop, Use Up, Down or W and S to move

Bike Rider is a simple 2D auto runner where you avoid boxes, gain score and test your abilities to move out the way of things :).

The Game progressively gets hard the more points you gain

This game was made to help me with learning the godot engine, and is the first one I've finished, not including the GDQuest tutorial game.
